synopsis.text: It's the year 2099 in Shinjuku, a sprawling metropolis that epitomizes the zenith of human innovation, where magic and technology have seamlessly intertwined to create a world unlike any other. Amidst the towering skyscrapers and vibrant neon lights, the legendary Demon Lord Veltol is reborn, five centuries after his initial reign. Once a formidable ruler, Veltol finds himself in unfamiliar territory, as the world he once dominated has evolved beyond recognition. However, the demon king remains undeterred by the advancements surrounding him. Instead, he sets his sights on reclaiming his former glory and seizing control of this brave new world, proving to all that his power and influence remain unmatched. Thus begins the thrilling tale of a demon king's quest for dominance in his second life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
